pages.text:
There are a total of 16 grapes and 3 grape-adjacent crops that can all be used to brew.

Only the base variety of grape, Pinot Noir, can be found in the wild and all other varieties must be sourced through either $(l:advanced/mutation)mutation$() or trading with villagers.

pages.title: Grapes
pages.text:
All of these grapes yield a different type of wine, all with different effects upon consumption.

Villagers also tend to appreciate wine, but you best make sure it is good.
